title: It’s Crunch Time for Netflix and These 5 Other Stocks
text:
Company earnings won’t begin pouring in for another week, but I’m ready now. The theme this reporting season is “Let’s get this over with.” Or maybe it’s “Anything but more macro stuff.”

On the whole, the numbers won’t be good, but they’ll be better than predicted. Analysts polled by FactSet say earnings per share for S&P 500 companies will fall 4.1% from the level a year ago. Most analysts follow the Showcase Showdown rule from The Price Is Right—guess as close as you can, but don’t go over—so companies tend to beat estimates....
description: Earnings season could generate big moves—up or down—in shares of Netflix, Hasbro, Mattel, AT&T, and Gap.
